summary: A blogger who has had terrible luck on Valentine's days meets a handsome veterinarian. Then she finds out he is the one who has been leaving rude comments on her Valentines day articles and she questions if her luck has changed at all.
cast: Sarah Rafferty|Sam Page|Jeremy Guilbaut|Heather Doerksen|Kimberley Sustad|Brenda Crichlow|Daryl Shuttleworth|Beverley Elliott|Hilary Jardine|Anthony Bolognese|Mike Dopud|Nesta Cooper|Pete Graham|Serge Houde|Morgan Davies|Mig Macario|Don Wright|Eileen Wright|Jane Hancock|Michelle Zembruski
title: La consejera del amor
